DOC.brief_summary: This open label , non randomize , uncontrolled , multicenter , single arm observational study . In study , enrol subject treat Rebif human serum albumin ( HSA ) -free formulation ( without RebiSmart ) 44 microgram ( mcg ) , subcutaneous ( sc ) , thrice week ( tiw ) 24 month .
DOC.brief_title: Non-interventional Study Assess Adherence Treatment Patients With Relapsing Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age equal ( > = ) 18 year less equal ( < = ) 60 year time Rebif introduction Subjects diagnose RMS accord revise McDonald criterion ( 2010 ) Treatment naïve subject DMDs switch Rebif . Subjects receive 1st Rebif 44 mcg dose signing informed consent Subjects willing able provide sign informed consent . Have contraindication treatment IFN beta1a sc accord European summary product characteristic ( EU SPC ) /prescribed information Subjects participate clinical studies/trials Any female subject childbearing potential contraceptive Subjects refusal participate study .
